name: Natural Selection
description:
Made in 8 hours for Gamecraft.

You need an Xbox Controller to control the Rat.

Cat:

Your goal is to catch the mouse

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

space to jump

Rat:

Your goal is to collect 7 pieces of cheese

Left stick to move

Right stick to look around

Y to jump

Credits:

Ryan O'Shea

Ben Stack

Vilius Drumsta
